mn37:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
mn37:3.3: Atha kho sakko devānamindo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn37:3.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn37:3.6: “kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu saṅkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti?
mn37:4.6: sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti;
mn37:4.7: sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti—
mn37:4.8: sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharati, virāgānupassī viharati, nirodhānupassī viharati, paṭinissaggānupassī viharati.
mn37:4.9: So tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharanto, virāgānupassī viharanto, nirodhānupassī viharanto, paṭinissaggānupassī viharanto na kiñci loke upādiyati.
mn37:4.10: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassati, aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati:
mn37:4.11: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
mn37:4.12: Ettāvatā kho, devānaminda, bhikkhu saṅkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
mn37:5.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
mn37:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti.
mn37:6.3: “kiṃ nu kho so yakkho bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhisamecca anumodi udāhu no;
mn37:6.5: yadi vā so yakkho bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhisamecca anumodi yadi vā no”ti?
mn37:6.7: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
mn37:6.9: pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde antarahito devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāturahosi.
mn37:6.10: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo ekapuṇḍarīke uyyāne dibbehi pañcahi tūriyasatehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti.
mn37:6.11: Addasā kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
mn37:6.12: Disvāna tāni dibbāni pañca tūriyasatāni paṭippaṇāmetvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
mn37:6.14: “ehi kho, mārisa moggallāna, svāgataṃ, mārisa moggallāna.
mn37:6.15: Cirassaṃ kho, mārisa moggallāna, imaṃ pariyāyaṃ akāsi yadidaṃ idhāgamanāya.
mn37:6.17: Nisīdi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno paññatte āsane.
mn37:6.18: Sakkopi kho devānamindo aññataraṃ nīcaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn37:6.19: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca: “
mn37:6.20: yathā kathaṃ pana kho, kosiya, bhagavā saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ abhāsi?
mn37:6.21: Sādhu mayampi etissā kathāya bhāgino assāma savanāyā”ti.
mn37:7.2: appeva sakena karaṇīyena, api ca devānaṃyeva tāvatiṃsānaṃ karaṇīyena.
mn37:7.3: Api ca, mārisa moggallāna, sussutaṃyeva hoti suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhāritaṃ, yaṃ no khippameva antaradhāyati.
mn37:7.4: Bhūtapubbaṃ, mārisa moggallāna, devāsurasaṅgāmo samupabyūḷho ahosi.
mn37:7.5: Tasmiṃ kho pana, mārisa moggallāna, saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājiniṃsu.
mn37:7.6: So kho ahaṃ, mārisa moggallāna, taṃ saṅgāmaṃ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tato paṭinivattitvā vejayantaṃ nāma pāsādaṃ māpesiṃ.
mn37:7.7: Vejayantassa kho, mārisa moggallāna, pāsādassa ekasataṃ niyyūhaṃ.
mn37:7.11: Iccheyyāsi no tvaṃ, mārisa moggallāna, vejayantassa pāsādassa rāmaṇeyyakaṃ daṭṭhun”ti?
mn37:8.1: Atha kho sakko ca devānamindo vessavaṇo ca mahārājā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ purakkhatvā yena vejayanto pāsādo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
mn37:8.2: Addasaṃsu kho sakkassa devānamindassa paricārikāyo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ;
mn37:8.3: disvā ottappamānā hirīyamānā sakaṃ sakaṃ ovarakaṃ pavisiṃsu.
mn37:8.4: Seyyathāpi nāma suṇisā sasuraṃ disvā ottappati hirīyati;
mn37:8.5: evameva sakkassa devānamindassa paricārikāyo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ disvā ottappamānā hirīyamānā sakaṃ sakaṃ ovarakaṃ pavisiṃsu.
mn37:8.6: Atha kho sakko ca devānamindo vessavaṇo ca mahārājā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ vejayante pāsāde anucaṅkamāpenti anuvicarāpenti:
mn37:8.7: “idampi, mārisa moggallāna, passa vejayantassa pāsādassa rāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
mn37:8.8: idampi, mārisa moggallāna, passa vejayantassa pāsādassa rāmaṇeyyakan”ti.
mn37:8.9: “Sobhati idaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa, yathā taṃ pubbe katapuññassa.
mn37:8.12: Tayidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa sobhati, yathā taṃ pubbe katapuññassā”ti.
mn37:8.16: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā vejayantaṃ pāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakena saṅkampesi sampakampesi sampavedhesi.
mn37:8.17: Atha kho sakko ca devānamindo, vessavaṇo ca mahārājā, devā ca tāvatiṃsā acchariyabbhutacittajātā ahesuṃ:
mn37:8.19: Samaṇassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā, yatra hi nāma dibbabhavanaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakena saṅkampessati sampakampessati sampavedhessatī”ti.
mn37:8.20: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ saṃviggaṃ lomahaṭṭhajātaṃ viditvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
mn37:8.21: “yathā kathaṃ pana kho, kosiya, bhagavā saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ abhāsi?
mn37:8.22: Sādhu mayampi etissā kathāya bhāgino assāma savanāyā”ti.
mn37:9.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho ahaṃ, mārisa moggallāna, bhagavantaṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn37:9.4: ‘kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu saṅkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan’ti?
mn37:10.1: Evaṃ vutte, mārisa moggallāna, bhagavā maṃ etadavoca:
mn37:10.4: Evañcetaṃ, devānaminda, bhikkhuno sutaṃ hoti “sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā”ti.
mn37:10.5: So sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā.
mn37:10.6: So tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharati, virāgānupassī viharati, nirodhānupassī viharati, paṭinissaggānupassī viharati.
mn37:10.7: So tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharanto, virāgānupassī viharanto, nirodhānupassī viharanto, paṭinissaggānupassī viharanto na kiñci loke upādiyati, anupādiyaṃ na paritassati, aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati:
mn37:10.8: “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti pajānāti.
mn37:10.9: Ettāvatā kho, devānaminda, bhikkhu saṅkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan’ti.
mn37:10.10: Evaṃ kho me, mārisa moggallāna, bhagavā saṅkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ abhāsī”ti.
mn37:11.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sakkassa devānamindassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā—
mn37:11.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
mn37:11.4: devesu tāvatiṃsesu antarahito pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde pāturahosi.
mn37:11.5: Atha kho sakkassa devānamindassa paricārikāyo acirapakkante āyasmante mahāmoggallāne sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn37:11.6: “eso nu te, mārisa, so bhagavā satthā”ti?
mn37:11.7: “Na kho me, mārisa, so bhagavā satthā.
mn37:11.9: “Lābhā te, mārisa, suladdhaṃ te, mārisa yassa te sabrahmacārī evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo.
mn37:11.10: Aho nūna te so bhagavā satthā”ti.
mn37:12.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn37:12.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn37:12.4: “abhijānāti no, bhante, bhagavā ahu ñātaññatarassa mahesakkhassa yakkhassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ bhāsitā”ti?
mn37:12.5: “Abhijānāmahaṃ, moggallāna, idha sakko devānamindo yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn37:12.7: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, moggallāna, sakko devānamindo maṃ etadavoca:
mn37:12.8: ‘kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan’ti.
mn37:13.1: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, moggallāna, sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavocaṃ ‘idha devānaminda, bhikkhuno sutaṃ hoti “sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā”ti.
mn37:13.2: Evaṃ cetaṃ, devānaminda, bhikkhuno sutaṃ hoti “sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyā”ti.
mn37:13.3: So sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā.
mn37:13.4: So tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharati, virāgānupassī viharati, nirodhānupassī viharati, paṭinissaggānupassī viharati.
mn37:13.5: So tāsu vedanāsu aniccānupassī viharanto, virāgānupassī viharanto, nirodhānupassī viharanto, paṭinissaggānupassī viharanto na kiñci loke upādiyati, anupādiyaṃ na paritassati, aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati:
mn37:13.6: “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti pajānāti.
mn37:13.7: Ettāvatā kho, devānaminda, bhikkhu saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno seṭṭho devamanussānan’ti.
mn37:13.8: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, moggallāna, abhijānāmi sakkassa devānamindassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ bhāsitā”ti.
mn37:14.2: Attamano āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
